0);&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;list-paddingleft-1&quot;},&quot;listitem&quot;,{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;section&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);font-size: 15px;line-height: 1.8em;letter-spacing: 0em;text-align: left;font-weight: normal;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 15px;line-height: 1.8em;letter-spacing: 0em;text-align: left;text-indent: 0em;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: 0px;margin-right: 0px;padding-top: 8px;padding-bottom: 8px;padding-left: 0px;padding-right: 0px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, \&quot;Microsoft Yahei\&quot;; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;  background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">playbook</span>脚本，使用Microsoft SQL Server集合在RHEL上配置SQL Server，并通过T-SQL脚本create_example_db.j2创建数据库。</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step2.yml： 一个<span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;section&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;data-tool&quot;:&quot;mdnice编辑器&quot;,&quot;data-website&quot;:&quot;https://www.mdnice.com&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: 0px;margin-right: 0px;padding-top: 0px;padding-bottom: 0px;padding-left: 10px;padding-right: 10px;background-attachment: scroll;background-clip: border-box;background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);background-image: none;background-origin: padding-box;background-position-x: 0%;background-position-y: 0%;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size: auto;width: auto;font-family: Optima, 'Microsoft YaHei', PingFangSC-regular, serif;font-size: 16px;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);line-height: 1.5em;word-spacing: 0em;letter-spacing: 0em;word-break: break-word;overflow-wrap: break-word;text-align: left;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;list&quot;,{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;ul&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;list-style-type: disc;margin-top: 8px;margin-bottom: 8px;margin-left: 0px;margin-right: 0px;padding-top: 0px;padding-bottom: 0px;padding-left: 25px;padding-right: 0px;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;list-paddingleft-1&quot;},&quot;listitem&quot;,{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;section&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);font-size: 15px;line-height: 1.8em;letter-spacing: 0em;text-align: left;font-weight: normal;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 15px;line-height: 1.8em;letter-spacing: 0em;text-align: left;text-indent: 0em;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: 0px;margin-right: 0px;padding-top: 8px;padding-bottom: 8px;padding-left: 0px;padding-right: 0px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:&quot;color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, \&quot;Microsoft Yahei\&quot;; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;  background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">playbook</span>脚本，使用Microsoft SQL Server集合在RHEL系统上配置另外两个SQL Server节点，用于创建三个节点的Always On高可用性组集群。</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step3包含的脚本：以下列出的每个playbook脚本使用Microsoft SQL Server Ansible集合配置SQL Server Always On高可用性组，然后使用RHEL角色为高可用性为特定类型的虚拟、物理或云环境配置RHEL高可用性附加组件：</span></p>







</li>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 25px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; list-style-type: disc; color: #000000;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step3-rhkvm.yml - 此示例配置一个设计用于裸金属、RHEL KVM虚拟化、Red Hat虚拟化或Red Hat OpenShift虚拟化的RHEL高可用性集群。</span>
</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step3-rhvmw.yml - 此示例配置一个设计用于VMware VSphere的RHEL高可用性集群。</span>
</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step3-rhazure.yml - 此示例配置一个设计用于Microsoft Azure的RHEL高可用性集群。</span>
</li>






</ul>






</ul>






<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 30px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; display: block;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; color: #0e88eb; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">开始准备</span></span></h3>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">一开始需要设置三台虚拟机，每台虚拟机运行RHEL 8.7和RHEL高可用性附加组件。如果您使用的是RHEL虚拟化和OpenShift虚拟化，它们都支持i63000esb设备。例如，如果您在RHEL上使用虚拟化并通过virt-install工具安装虚拟机，您可以使用以下命令：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code># virt-install --name mssql1 --memory 4096 --vcpus 2 --disk size=20 --os-variant rhel8.7 --watchdog i6300esb,action=reset --cdrom=/mnt/isos/rhel-8.7-x86_64-dvd.iso
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">我们还需要按照博客《</span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">RHEL系统角色简介</span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">》</span>（<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">https://www.redhat.com/en/blog/introduction-rhel-system-roles</span>）</p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">中概述的过程安装和配置</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">ansible-core</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">和</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">rhel-system-roles</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">软件包。完成后，您需要安装Microsoft SQL Server角色，命令如下：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code># dnf install ansible-collection-microsoft-sql
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">接下来，修改inventory文件以满足您的环境需求。该文件包含您将要部署集群的物理主机或虚拟机的名称。inventory文件格式如下：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>all:
&nbsp; hosts:
&nbsp; &nbsp; mssql1:
&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; mssql_ha_replica_type: primary
&nbsp; &nbsp; mssql2:
&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; mssql_ha_replica_type: synchronous
&nbsp; &nbsp; mssql3:
&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; mssql_ha_replica_type: witness
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">修改每个主机，以确保名称与您集群中的主机名匹配。此示例使用了三个名为：mssql1、mssql2和mssql3的主机。首先，mssql1将是初始的主节点，而mssql2将是一个同步副本，mssql3将作为仅配置副本。如果希望使用两个同步副本，可以将第三个副本指定为同步副本。</span></p>
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 30px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; display: block;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; color: #0e88eb; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">开始部署</span></span></h3>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">接下来，修改文件</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step1.yml</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">和</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step2.yml</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">。在这两个文件中，您可能需要修改以下参数：</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 25px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; list-style-type: disc; color: #000000;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_password</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">： 您将在每台服务器上为sa账户配置的密码。</span>
</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_edition</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">： 您将使用的SQL Server版本，可能的选择包括Enterprise、Standard、Developer或Express（对于仅配置副本）。</span>
</li>






</ul>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">在step1.yml文件中，您还需要修改</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_db_name</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">参数，该参数指定您要加入到AlwaysOn集群的那些数据库的名称。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">接下来，修改</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">create_example_db.j2</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">文件。该文件是用T-SQL编写，用于加载一个数据库。您可以创建一个新的数据库，或者从备份中恢复一个数据库。无论哪种方式，确保数据库名称与您为</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_db_name</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">设置的名称匹配。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">对于step3.yml，如上所述，根据您将运行的环境，有三种可能的选择。我们将使用RHEL虚拟机，因此我们将按如下方式修改</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">step3-rhkvm.yml</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">文件：</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 25px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; list-style-type: disc; color: #000000;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_password</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">： 我们为sa账户使用的密码</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_virtual_ip</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">： 用于连接SQL Server的虚拟IP地址。如果发生主机故障，该地址将转移到AlwaysOn可用性组中的其他成员。您可以在操作系统的hosts文件或DNS中为此VIP设置主机名。它将与AlwaysOn的侦听器关联。</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_ag_name</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">： AlwaysOn可用性组名称，将显示在如SQL Server Management Studio中。</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_db_names</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">： 需要加入到AlwaysOn可用性组的数据库列表。</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_master_key_password</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">：数据库主密钥</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_private_key_password</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">：数据加密密钥。</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql_ha_login_password</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">：PacemakerLogin数据库登录用户的密码</span></p>







</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">ha_cluster_hacluster_password</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">：Pacemaker集群的集群用户密码</span></p>







</li>






</ul>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">在所有这些设置完成后，在Ansible的工作目录（需要将脚本复制到Ansible控制节点目录）开始执行脚本，命令如下：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>$ ./run.sh
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">要验证您的配置是否正常运行，在mssql1数据库节点上使用以下命令查看Pacemaker集群状态：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code># pcs status
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">如果Pacemaker集群运行正常，这将输出如下内容：<img src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/sz_mmbiz_png/4btH7yPYCW2PvBich9w659YMXVmVxDoc7VMqW9fQgnzzyBtpRQKmaENZhMvVxKenL5RkicKd3BeiatpUwF1hGHCXA/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;from=appmsg&amp;tp=webp&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;wx_co=1" alt="图片" class="rich_pages wxw-img" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; vertical-align: bottom; height: auto !important; display: block; visibility: visible !important; width: 657px !important;" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/sz_mmbiz_png/4btH7yPYCW2PvBich9w659YMXVmVxDoc7VMqW9fQgnzzyBtpRQKmaENZhMvVxKenL5RkicKd3BeiatpUwF1hGHCXA/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;from=appmsg" data-ratio="0.6411411411411412" data-type="png" data-w="666" data-imgfileid="100002138" data-original-style="display: block;margin-top: 0px;margin-right: auto;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: auto;max-width: 100%;" data-index="1" data-fail="0"></span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">在这里，我们可以看到有三个节点加入了集群：</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql1</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">、</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql2</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">&nbsp;和</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql3</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">。所有节点都处于在线状态。当前的虚拟IP资源与</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql1</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">绑定，因为当前</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql1</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">是AlwaysOn的主要副本节点。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">要确定AlwaysOn的侦听器正在使用的VIP浮动虚拟地址，可以运行以下命令：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code># pcs resource config
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">输出结果将显示您为应用程序配置的VIP地址，供应用程序访问：<img src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/sz_mmbiz_png/4btH7yPYCW2PvBich9w659YMXVmVxDoc7fusgoicSCd826GG6yt0R03jmFpOKq2DlaQ28aTnajDckGTRiccERgLWQ/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;from=appmsg&amp;tp=webp&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;wx_co=1" alt="图片" class="rich_pages wxw-img" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; vertical-align: bottom; height: auto !important; display: block; visibility: visible !important; width: 657px !important;" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/sz_mmbiz_png/4btH7yPYCW2PvBich9w659YMXVmVxDoc7fusgoicSCd826GG6yt0R03jmFpOKq2DlaQ28aTnajDckGTRiccERgLWQ/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;from=appmsg" data-ratio="0.5746268656716418" data-type="png" data-w="670" data-imgfileid="100002140" data-original-style="display: block;margin-top: 0px;margin-right: auto;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: auto;max-width: 100%;" data-index="2" data-fail="0">这里我们看到，目标VIP地址是 192.168.200.254。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">从命令行，我可以使用以下命令进行连接：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>$ /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S 192.168.200.254 -U sa -P &lt;mssql_password&gt; 其中，mssql_password为SA账户设置的密码。
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">为了验证数据库故障转移是否正常工作，我们可以简单地通过以下命令关闭主要副本节点：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>poweroff &nbsp;&nbsp;#直接关机
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">然后我们只需通过SSH连接到集群中的仍然处于活动状态的节点，并使用以下命令检查其状态：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>pcs status
</code></pre>
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><img src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/sz_mmbiz_png/4btH7yPYCW2PvBich9w659YMXVmVxDoc7YO4jFBJR0lYFyLUHibHEiak2ibE8zaLuDk2nbqG4CNRAHSGicqGqOyGPRQ/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;from=appmsg&amp;tp=webp&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;wx_co=1" alt="图片" class="rich_pages wxw-img" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; vertical-align: bottom; height: auto !important; display: block; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: #85a1c9 0px 0px 5px 0px; visibility: visible !important; width: 657px !important;" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/sz_mmbiz_png/4btH7yPYCW2PvBich9w659YMXVmVxDoc7YO4jFBJR0lYFyLUHibHEiak2ibE8zaLuDk2nbqG4CNRAHSGicqGqOyGPRQ/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;from=appmsg" data-ratio="0.7136363636363636" data-type="png" data-w="660" data-imgfileid="100002139" data-original-style="display: block;margin-top: 0px;margin-right: auto;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: auto;max-width: 100%;border-top-style: none;border-bottom-style: none;border-left-style: none;border-right-style: none;border-top-width: 3px;border-bottom-width: 3px;border-left-width: 3px;border-right-width: 3px;border-top-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);border-bottom-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);border-left-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);border-right-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);border-top-left-radius: 0px;border-top-right-radius: 0px;border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;object-fit: fill;box-shadow: rgb(133, 161, 201) 0px 0px 5px 0px;" data-index="3" data-fail="0"></span>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">在这里我们看到，</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql2</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">和</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql3</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">处于在线状态。由于我们将</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql3</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">配置为【仅配置副本】，因此数据库无法从</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql3</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">提供服务，所以</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql2</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">将成为主要副本节点。我们看到虚拟IP已经绑定到</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql2</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">上，而</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">mssql1</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">已经停止。我们可以通过再次运行以下命令来验证我们的数据库服务器是否正在运行：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>$ /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S 192.168.200.254 -U sa -P &lt;mssql_password&gt;&nbsp;
</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">验证连接成功！在典型的环境中，使用Ansible自动化部署SQL Server Always On可用性组的整个过程大约需要</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">五分钟</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">。Ansible的系统角色中包含了很多验证集群工作正常的最佳实践。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">本次部署演示由</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">Red Hat</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">的Louis Imershein和</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #0e88eb; font-weight: bold; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">Microsoft</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">的Amit Khandelwal呈现，演示内容包括本文中概述的过程，并展示了在RHEL上与SQL Server一起提供的一些新功能。本次ansible脚本适用于SQL Server 2017到SQL Server 2022版本。</span></p>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 30px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; display: block;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; color: #0e88eb; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">总结</span></span></h3>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #000000; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">本文介绍了如何使用Ansible在Linux平台上自动化部署SQL Server AlwaysOn集群。本文提供了社区支持的自动化ansible脚本来帮助在Azure、裸金属虚拟机、VMware VSphere等环境中设置SQL Server高可用性组。整个部署过程分为三步：安装和配置初始SQL Server、添加额外节点并配置AlwaysOn集群、配置高可用性服务。</span></p>
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span>
<h4 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 30px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; display: block;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; color: #000000; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">文章出处</span></span></h4>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 25px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; list-style-type: disc; color: #000000;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">https://www.redhat.com/en/blog/introduction-rhel-system-roles</span>
</li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">https://www.redhat.com/en/blog/automate-microsoft-sql-server-always-availability-groups-red-hat-enterprise-linux</span>
</li>






</ul>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9); font-family: 'PingFang SC', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; orphans: 2; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-wrap: wrap; white-space-collapse: collapse; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; letter-spacing: 0.578px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9); font-family: 'PingFang SC', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; orphans: 2; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-wrap: wrap; white-space-collapse: collapse; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; letter-spacing: 0.578px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">文中的Ansible相关playbook下载地址如下：</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 1.2em; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9); font-family: 'PingFang SC', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: 0.544px; orphans: 2; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; list-style-type: disc;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 10px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; font-family: Optima, 'Microsoft YaHei', PingFangSC-regular, serif; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; line-height: 1.5em; word-spacing: 0em; letter-spacing: 0em; word-break: break-word; text-align: left;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">https://github.com/redhat-cop/sqlserver-coi/tree/master/ansible/playbooks/SQLclusterPlaybooks</span></p>






</li>






</ul>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 1.2em; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9); font-family: 'PingFang SC', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: 0.544px; orphans: 2; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; list-style-type: disc;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 10px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; font-family: Optima, 'Microsoft YaHei', PingFangSC-regular, serif; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; line-height: 1.5em; word-spacing: 0em; letter-spacing: 0em; word-break: break-word; text-align: left;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">https://www.redhat.com/en/technologies/linux-platforms/enterprise-linux/sql-server</span></p>






</li>






</ul>
<p>
